item.description:
*** This month we'll be at Dat's Pizzeria & Sports Pub in downtown Somersworth!  ***

This site used to be Station 319, a legendary Somersworth haunt, and after a few years as Joe's Pizza is now under new management.  Literally, they are having their Grand Opening while I type this!  If *this* one doesn't get us an investigation, I need to hang up my stirrups!

Anecdotes include moving objects, appearing and disappearing objects, and several reports of two different apparitions!  Seriously!  I'm excited they're back open!

 

t's easy to find once you're on Main Street - it's just off of downtown and the old Station 319 sign is still hanging by the street.

 

The monthly dinner meetings are primarily non-mandatory networking events. Although we talk business updates for half an hour and occasionally play evidence clips, these events are for discussion, event/investigation planning, asking questions, telling your own stories, etc. They're so we can all have a little unpressured time as a group. Because our regular place has closed down we are going back to our roots and will be choosing a different reportedly haunted location to meet at each month. Keep your eye on the meetup post for details. We look forward to you joining us!
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group Monthly Meetup
